pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distributions for Ecological Models in 'nimble' // Common ecological distributions for 'nimble' models in the form of nimbleFunction objects. Includes Cormack-Jolly-Seber, occupancy, dynamic occupancy, hidden Markov, dynamic hidden Markov, and N-mixture models. (Jolly (1965) DOI: 10.2307/2333826, Seber (1965) DOI: 10.2307/2333827, Turek et al. (2016) doi:10.1007/s10651-016-0353-z).
